item.description:
downtown restaurants compete for the title of Best Signature Cocktail of Portsmouth. This year's event will feature a cocktail pairing that will highlight both food and drink menus. Next food network star and new england resident Tommy Grella will judge the best paired cocktail among the participants.

The event Is a great way to meet new people as attendees visit each restaurant during the tasting.

Participants Include: Riverwatch @Sheraton Harborside,Blue Mermaid,Hilton Garden Inn,Brazo,Popvers In the square,Rudi's portsmouth and Ri Ra Irish pub.Tickets are $20 in advance/$30 at door and can be purchased at CLICK HERE
item.name: 3rd Annual Portsmouth Cocktail Competition June 7th 4-8 pm
